resources.name: Day of the Thread Sleeve Case

name: ipad-cases-for-schools
notes:
Ipad 2 must have accessories for schools
 

The Ipad 2 by Apple Inc. comes with various new jaw-dropping features ranging from a wide collection of applications to sleek hardware capabilities. Now that you have explored every inch of your new Ipad 2 and downloaded the best apps you realize that you need more customizing to best suit your need s and that is where the Ipad 2 accessories come in. I have compiled a list of the must have Ipad 2 accessories for you below.

1) [iPad Cases](http://www.protectthepad.com/ "ipad cases") 

Designed by Apple, this sleek cover serves to protect your iPad 2 screen while still maintaining the stylish dashing looks and thin appearance. The Smart Covers are available in many colors from pink to black in either leather or polyurethane material. Priced at 39.99 dollars for polyurethane and 69 dollars for leather.

2)   [Apple Wireless Keyboard](http://www.protectthepad.com/ "Title") 

This ultra thin light-weight keyboard from Apple works by using Bluetooth connection and helps you type your documents faster with a smartly spaced keyboard made from anodized aluminum that can even power down your iPad. Priced at 69.99 dollars.

3) Apple Digital AV Adapter
Ever wanted to watch movies, view pictures, stream videos and play games that are in your iPad 2 on your HDTV, well this adapter cable does exactly that through the use of your TV's HDMI port. An additional pin lets you charge your iPad 2 while mirroring. Priced at 39 dollars.

4) Logictech Keyboard Case
Manufactured by ZAGG, this keyboard offers a variety of features all packed in a neat fashion keyboard. It slides out to reveal a Bluetooth keyboard with specialized apple keys and awakening your device. When closed, it packs itself and provides a sleek cover for your iPad. Priced at 99.99 dollars.

5) Philips Docking System
Designed by renowned manufacturer Philips, this docking station unleashes your music and offers up to 30W RMS of Dynamic Bass Boost sound and also charges your iPad. With its aluminum body cabinet and Neodymium speakers it enriches your music quality with a deep bass.

6) Wacom Bamboo Stylus
Manufactured by Wacom, this stylus allows users to take notes, draw and interact with the iPad 2 screen. The pen is praised for its touch responsiveness, ergonomic design, comfort and its professional look. Priced at 29.99 dollars on www.amazon.com
title: iPad Cases for Schools
